description:
Wayde is friends with Teo and Dyson.
I think Wayde saw how much work his friends were getting, and since they were both straight and comfortable with the scenes, he figured he could get in on the action too.
He's a very tall lean boy. About 6'3". So if you like the skinny boys, he's perfect for ya.
He said he would do "everything" with a guy when we first talked on the phone. I was guessing that Teo and Dyson had filled him in on what all they do for the site, since they set me up with him. Well, it turns out, they really didn't clarify much. As I came to suspect they still stay a bit on the down low about what all they do.
So "everything" to Wayde was basically getting his dick sucked. I had to laugh, 'cuz I was asking him, "So will you top, bottom, suck dick?" to which his reply was, "Um, oh I never thought about all that."
We will have to see. He IS relaxed. Maybe he will be back to play some more.
title: Wayde - Solo
